mapper.select: select c.id as 'id', o.id as 'orderid', u.icon as 'user_icon', u.nike_name as 'user_nickname', DATE_FORMAT(c.create_date,"%Y-%m-%d %T") as 'consultation_time', c.body as 'body', c.therapy as 'therapy', c.content as 'content', (select icon from sys_user_info where id = o.doctorid) as 'doctor_icon', (select name from sys_doctor_info where doctorid = o.doctorid) as 'doctor_name', c.replytime as 'replytime', c.reply as 'reply' from sys_consultation c left join sys_consultation_order o on c.id = o.consultationid left join sys_user_info u on o.create_by = u.id where c.id = #{id} and c.del_flag = '0' and o.del_flag = '0' limit 0,1
select * from sys_consultation_pic where consultationid = #{id} and del_flag = '0'
